channel.title: {NEW} Gamblerscape {NEW} - 718/742 -
channel.description:
[size=x-large]Eco Based & PVP (Spawn) World 718/742 Server![/size]
[size=x-large][url=http://www.gamblerscape.org]Gamblerscape Portal[/url] [url=http://gamblerscape.org/test/downloads.php]Gamblerscape Client Downloads[/url] [url=http://gamblerscape.org/test/highscores.php]Gamblerscape Highscores[/url] [url=http://gamblerscape.org/donate/]Gamblerscape Donation Page[/url] [url=http://gamblerscape.org/vote/#?step=1]Gamblerscape Vote[/url] [/size]
[size=large]24/7 Uptime!
FEATURES:
- Spawn world (PvP) and Eco World - Starter Packs (Select which path you'll choose!) - Multiple Exp Levels (RSPS Rates, 100x, 10x, 1x) - Working Highscores - 24/7 Uptime - Custom Items - Working Clues - Torva/Pernix/Virtus - Glacors with all Boot Drops - Pvp Gear (Degrades during combat) - QBD - Kiln + Fight Cave
Starter Packs to choose what path your journey will take you on:
http://prntscr.com/44gmto
Custom Exp Rates (Choose your level of difficulty)
http://prntscr.com/44gn2u
Custom Quest Tab - Server Status Info
http://prntscr.com/44gilu
Easy Teleportation
http://prntscr.com/44gnrp (via ::teleports)
Oracle of Dawn (Teleports and more)
http://prntscr.com/44gkwn
Multiple Bosses
http://prntscr.com/44gjj6 (Page 1) http://prntscr.com/44gj3y (Page 2) http://prntscr.com/44gj7o (Page 3) http://prntscr.com/44gjcv (Page 4)
and MORE!
Training Locations:
http://prntscr.com/44gjrw
All Skills Trainable:
http://prntscr.com/44gjxk
Max Cape:
http://prntscr.com/44gkbz
Comp Cape (Normal and Trimmed)
http://prntscr.com/44gkhx[/size]
[size=xx-large]Any questions feel free to post here & If you have no questions then what are you waiting for!? [url=http://gamblerscape.org/test/downloads.php]Download Gamblerscape NOW![/url] and let's get this going!!![/size]

item.title: {NEW} Gamblerscape {NEW} - 718/742 -
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Are those shops I see? Stop calling your server an eco server, because you have no economy. People will buy from shops and have no interest in skilling or doing anything because they can just go to the store buy everything and then go train.

Suggestion: Rip out all of those shops besides general store, place all good drops in interesting mobs, and create training spaces for players to fish, cook, collect herbs & secondaries, and THEN you can call it an eco server.

Read full topic
